A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I understand why some people were disappointed by TLJ\, especially the way it portrayed Luke. On consideration and second viewing though I enjoyed it much more. I've accepted that though it's not what I wanted to see\, Luke has to behave like he does in this film as it's the only thing that makes sense given what happened at the end of TFA.

Highlight: lightsabre fight\, Rey/ ren interplay\, Lifting rocks!
Not so good: anticlimatic and somewhat confusing end to a beloved character. 

Ps. The return to binary good/ bad by the end was a bit disappointing also. There was some juicy grey areas thrown up in the middle that just got thrown out again at the end.
